availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: B. Patterson Thompson (Fulton County, KY, farmer )

body.p: Fulton County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Mary A. Thompson. Father of Nancy A. Thompson, William L. Thompson, Elizabeth Thompson, Caroline Thompson, and Mary B. Thompson. Farmer in Fulton County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Fulton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fulton County, p. 147A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fulton County, p. 444.
